name: Marco Arment on Twitter: "Rights belong to people, not states."

summary:
@cleverdevil he is of course absolutely right .... sadly in America that is not in the interest of the people who run the country - much like why corporations seem to have more rights than the people in them. 
John (I am my own System of Record) Philpin
